```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Load libraries

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(knitr)
```

## Load Biogeme parameters

```{r, message=FALSE}
bio_results <- here("models",
                    "indy-choice",
                    "biogeme_parameters_indy.csv") |>
  read_csv(show_col_types = FALSE) |>
  rename(Parameter = `...1`) |>
  mutate(sig = case_when(`Rob. p-value` < 0.001 ~ "***",
                         `Rob. p-value` < 0.01 ~ "**",
                         `Rob. p-value` < 0.05 ~ "*",
                         TRUE ~ ""))
  

kable(bio_results, digits = 3)
```

## Load predictions

```{r, message=FALSE}
sim_data <- here("data",
                 "sim-data.csv") |>
  read_csv(show_col_types = FALSE)

predictions <- here("models",
                    "indy-choice",
                    "biogeme_preds_indy.csv") |>
  read_csv(show_col_types = FALSE) |>
  cbind(sim_data)
```

## Visualizations

```{r}
fn_plot_preds_c <- function(my_preds,
                          to_vary) {
  my_preds |>
    filter(vary == to_vary) |>
    select(c(matches(to_vary), starts_with("Prob. "))) |>
    pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("Prob. "),
                 names_to = "Mode",
                 values_to = "Probability",
                 names_prefix = "Prob. ") |>
    mutate(Mode = factor(Mode, 
                         levels = c("alone", 
                                    "mom",
                                    "mom and dad",
                                    "dad",
                                    "non-hh",
                                    "sibling"),
                         labels = c("Alone", 
                                    "With mom",
                                    "With both mom and dad",
                                    "With dad",
                                    "With a non-household member",
                                    "With a sibling"))) |>
    rename(to_vary = !!to_vary) |>
    ggplot() +
    geom_area(aes(x = to_vary,
                  y = Probability,
                  fill = Mode)) +
    scale_fill_brewer(type = "qual") +
    theme_minimal() +
    scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(0, 0.5, 1),
                       labels = c("0", "50%", "100%")) 
}

fn_plot_preds_b <- function(my_preds,
                          to_vary) {
  my_preds |>
    filter(vary == to_vary) |>
    select(c(matches(to_vary), starts_with("Prob. "))) |>
    pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("Prob. "),
                 names_to = "Mode",
                 values_to = "Probability",
                 names_prefix = "Prob. ") |>
    mutate(Mode = factor(Mode, 
                         levels = c("alone", 
                                    "mom",
                                    "mom and dad",
                                    "dad",
                                    "non-hh",
                                    "sibling"),
                         labels = c("Alone", 
                                    "With mom",
                                    "With both mom and dad",
                                    "With dad",
                                    "With a non-household member",
                                    "With a sibling"))) |>
    rename(to_vary = !!to_vary) |>
    ggplot() +
    geom_col(aes(x = as_factor(to_vary),
                  y = Probability,
                  fill = Mode),
             position = "stack") +
    scale_fill_brewer(type = "qual") +
    theme_minimal() +
    scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(0, 0.5, 1),
                       labels = c("0", "50%", "100%")) 
}
```

## Vary age

```{r}
fn_plot_preds_c(predictions, "age") +
  scale_x_continuous(name = "Child's age")
```

## Vary gender

```{r}
fn_plot_preds_b(predictions, "female") +
  scale_x_discrete(name = "Child's gender",
                   labels = c("Boys", "Girls"))
```

## Vary presence of younger sibling

```{r}
fn_plot_preds_b(predictions, "has_lil_sib") +
  scale_x_discrete(name = "Presence of younger sibling (or twin)",
                   labels = c("False", "True"))
```
